name: Inspiration Dave
summary: Inspiration Dave is a 2012 flash platformer by Melos Han-Tani (co-creator of Anodyne series.) You control a character on a mission to find inspiration through musical notes throughout whatever world he lives in - via going through 33 small platforming stages, with three goals: Finish the stage, collect all 20 notes, and finish the stage 100% very quickly! Only finishing the stage is necessary. There are unlockable secrets for how many notes you collect and stages you finish quickly.
